name: Binding Of Issac De-make
description:
Simple Binding of Issac de-make in the atari 2600 style. Made as a university game jam, may continue at some point.

Made in collaboration with fellow team mates: Charlie Evans (twitter, Github, itch), Alex Hillman (twitter, Github), Alex Long (twitter, Github) , Stephanie Chan (Github), Vlad (Github)

(Me too: (Github, twitter)
